original_text: And the king commanded it so to be done: and the decree was given at Shushan; and they hanged Haman's ten sons.
korean_text: 왕이 그대로 행하기를 허락하고 조서를 수산에 내리니 하만의 열 아들의 시체가 매달리니라

sentences.original_text: And the king commanded it so to be done:
and the decree was given at Shushan;
and they hanged Haman's ten sons.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 하만의 아들 열 사람을 매달았다
